bugs.summary: Lagging and hanging very slow, unresponsive for seconds up to 10s of seconds - long CC on LookerStudio
Firefox hangs on MacOS for seconds, getting worse over time
Lag spike after same page navigation (history.pushState)
Firefox hangs on opening new webpages
Resizing the browser window with https://data.firefox.com/dashboard/hardware open uses 100% CPU load for about 20s
